com.ems.service

Class AbstractFileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ems.service.AbstractFileService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileService

    public abstract class AbstractFileService
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class AbstractFileService. Abstract class for managing read/write/update/delete operations on json file database.
